scripts.haxelib:build:debug: bun run haxelib:compile && bun run haxelib:patch && bun run haxelib:swc:debug && bun run haxelib:copy
scripts.haxelib:build:release: bun run haxelib:compile && bun run haxelib:patch && bun run haxelib:swc:release && bun run haxelib:copy
scripts.haxelib:build:final: bun run haxelib:compile && bun run haxelib:patch && bun run haxelib:swc:final && bun run haxelib:copy
scripts.haxelib:compile: bun run assert-tools && (cd client-hx && lime build flash)
scripts.haxelib:test: cd client-hx && haxe -p src -p test --run com.bymr.tests.TestMain
scripts.assert-tools: bun run scripts/assert-haxe.ts && bun run scripts/assert-lime.ts && bun run scripts/assert-openfl.ts
